= Release Notes =

== version 0.0.2 02.10.2009 ==

In this version database schema was changes ans unfortunately complete database clear is required. Please follow these instructions to upgrade running sites.

Clean installation:

 # Upload version 0.0.2 and select it as the default version
 # run setup url /setup

Version upgrade steps:

 # In application running previous version make site export
 # Upload version 0.0.2 and select it as the default version
 # Completely clear the database
 # run setup url /setup
 # Import previously exported site
